Vue - Getting Started

Vue is a progressive framework for building user interface.

CDN

You can get the CDN from Vue installation and reference it in your application.

<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue@2.5.13/dist/vue.js"></script>

Remove the version @2.5.13, youâ€™ll always received the latest version.
